name: Mech Delivery Mayhem
description:
You are working for a delivery company because being a villain isn't profitable anymore.  But PLEASE, try not to destroy the WHOLE CITY this time!!! 
Or don't. I'm not your boss.

Just keep in mind that they will send the whole squad after you.

____________________________________________________________________________

Created for the Mechjam3 2022 in approx 7 days. 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Mouse - Attack

Shift - Dash

______________
